articles.title: Google's Nearby Share arrives on Windows to let you transfer files between PC and Android - The Verge
articles.description: Google has launched a Nearby Share app for Windows. The beta app is available in the US and other markets, and lets you easily transfer files between Android devices and Windows PCs.
articles.content:

articles.author: Fiona Jackson
articles.title: Has NASA found life on Mars? Perseverance collects Martian soil - Daily Mail
articles.description: The car-sized Perseverance rover cored down into the sediment of Jezero Crater on the Red Planet, marking the first sample of its new campaign.
articles.content:
NASA's Perseverance Rover has collected a sample of Martian rock to be returned to Earth which could contain signs of life.
But don't get too excited yet, as this particular tube won't reach a terre… [+9183 chars]

articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: NASA will unveil its first moon crew in 50 years tomorrow - Daily Mail
articles.description: Three Americans and a Canadian will be revealed to the world on Monday (April 3) as they gear up to fly around our lunar satellite as part of the Artemis II mission scheduled for 2024.
articles.content: Fifty two years ago, David Bowie was headlining Glastonbury, Muhammad Ali and Joe Frazier traded blows in the 'Fight of the Century', and John Lennon left Britain for the final time before his murder… [+14406 chars]

articles.title: 262-foot asteroid among 5 nearing Earth, reveals NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: The upcoming week will see some gigantic asteroids racing towards Earth. NASA has revealed their size, speed, and distance. Check all the details here.
